name: Blame the Games
description:
You play as a single person with a gun.

This game is about how the media exaggerates and or blames violence in real life such as mass shootings, targeted assault, attacks, etc. on video games such as any of the Call of Duty or Battlefield games. This game targets that by giving the player an automatic rifle which they can use to kill nearby wandering non-player characters (NPCs). Large billboards, TV screens and mobile electronic devices will then show up with a realtime view of another perspective such as security cameras.
